title: Bruschetta - The Heritage Collection
description: Introducing The Heritage Collection, a new product line developed by Legacy, a division of Picnic Time, Inc. in partnership with Chef Fabio Viviani. This premier line of products was inspired by Viviani's rustic, gourmet cooking style.

asset.author: Picnic Time Family of Brands
asset.description:
Introducing The Heritage Collection, a new product line developed by Legacy, a division of Picnic Time, Inc. in partnership with Chef Fabio Viviani. This premier line of products was inspired by Viviani's rustic, gourmet cooking style.

www.picnictime.com/heritage
heritage@picnictime.com

transcripts: Bruschetta! Yes, the pronunciation is "brusKETTA" not bru"SHETTA" like most people in America say. Also Bruschetta is the name of our bread board. This bread cutting board is very versatile. First of all, it's made out of a solid piece of ocasia. On top of the cutting board there is a reversible piece of wood with a smooth surface for serving and the surface with the ridges that give you the ability to cut even pieces of bread. Also the item come with three ceramic trade that are perfect to serve  complimentary things for your bread. The presentation is beautiful and this is a must have in your kitchen, especially if you are like me, you love a piece of bread.
